input.sentences: its nice to have a jam session outdoors at night .
get some people together and listen to some good music .
people enjoy a good drink with great tunes playing in the background .
there is a cello and guitar playing together .
this man seems to be enjoying the atmosphere very much .
output.sentences: I went downtown this evening to catch a local street band playing.
I love the atmosphere of being outside and listening to live music.
Lots of other people from town were there, enjoying a beer and relaxing.
The band was really cool, they even had a cello!
We got to meet and greet them after they finished playing as well.
